text: "Tabloid Junkie" is a song performed by American recording artist Michael Jackson from his album HIStory: Past, Present and Future, Book I, released in 1995. The song critiques the media's obsession with sensationalism and the impact it has on people's lives, particularly celebrities. The lyrics express frustration with how the media manipulates stories and invades personal privacy, highlighting themes of exploitation and the dangers of becoming overly engrossed in tabloid culture.
title: Tabloid Junkie
